00041 class YardNewCustomer: public wxWizard
00042 {
00043  public:
00044      YardNewCustomer(wxWindow* parent, int id = -1, const wxString& title = wxEmptyString, 
00045         const wxBitmap& bitmap = wxNullBitmap, const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition)
00046         :wxWizard(parent, id, title, bitmap, pos) 
00047     {
00048         wxXmlResource::Get()->Load("res/new_customer.xrc");
00049     }
00050     
00051     YardCustType& GetCustomer() { return m_cust; }
00052     
00053   private:
00054     YardCustType m_cust;      
00055 };
00056 
00057 class YardNewCustomer1: public wxWizardPageSimple
00058 {
00059  public:
00060     YardNewCustomer1(YardNewCustomer *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00061     {
00062         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewCust1");
00063         m_first = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_FIRST")));
00064         m_middle = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_MIDDLE")));
00065         m_last = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_LAST")));
00066     }
00067 
00068     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00069     {
00070         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetFirstName(m_first->GetValue().c_str());
00071         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetMiddleName(m_middle->GetValue().c_str());
00072         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetLastName(m_last->GetValue().c_str());
00073         return true;
00074     }
00075 
00076  private:
00077     YardNewCustomer * m_parent;
00078     wxTextCtrl * m_first;
00079     wxTextCtrl * m_middle;
00080     wxTextCtrl * m_last;
00081       
00082 };
00083 
00084 class YardNewCustomer2: public wxWizardPageSimple
00085 {
00086  public:
00087     YardNewCustomer2(YardNewCustomer *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00088     {
00089         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewCust2");
00090         m_address = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_ADDRESS")));
00091         m_city = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_CITY")));
00092         m_state = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_STATE")));
00093         m_zip = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_ZIP"))); 
00094         m_phone = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_PHONE")));
00095                 
00096     }
00097 
00098     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00099     {
00100         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetAddress(m_address->GetValue().c_str());
00101         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetCity(m_city->GetValue().c_str());
00102         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetState(m_state->GetValue().c_str());
00103         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetZip(m_zip->GetValue().c_str());
00104         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetPhone(m_phone->GetValue().c_str());
00105         return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108  private:
00109     YardNewCustomer * m_parent;
00110     wxTextCtrl * m_address;
00111     wxTextCtrl * m_city;
00112     wxTextCtrl * m_state;
00113     wxTextCtrl * m_zip;
00114     wxTextCtrl * m_phone;
00115       
00116 };

00118 class YardNewCustomer3: public wxWizardPageSimple
00119 {
00120  public:
00121     YardNewCustomer3(YardNewCustomer *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00122     {
00123         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewCust3");
00124         m_ccNum = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_CC")));
00125         m_ccName = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_CC_NAME")));
00126         m_ccExp = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_CC_EXP")));
00127                 
00128     }
00129 
00130     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00131     {
00132         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetCreditCardNumber(m_ccNum->GetValue().c_str());
00133         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetCreditCardName(m_ccName->GetValue().c_str());
00134         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetCreditCardExpiration(m_ccExp->GetValue().c_str());
00135         return true;
00136     }
00137 
00138  private:
00139     YardNewCustomer * m_parent;
00140     wxTextCtrl * m_ccNum;
00141     wxTextCtrl * m_ccName;
00142     wxTextCtrl * m_ccExp;
00143       
00144 };
00145 
00146 class YardNewCustomer4: public wxWizardPageSimple
00147 {
00148  public:
00149     YardNewCustomer4(YardNewCustomer *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00150     {
00151         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewCust4");
00152         m_min = panel->GetSizer()->CalcMin();
00153         m_pic = static_cast<wxStaticBitmap *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_PIC")));
00154         m_sig = static_cast<wxStaticBitmap *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CUST_SIG")));
00155                
00156     }
00157     
00158     void OnSig(wxCommandEvent& event)
00159     {
00160         m_sigloc = wxFileSelector(wxT("Select a signature file"), "", "",
00161             ".jpg", "*.jpg", wxFILE_MUST_EXIST, this);
00162         
00163         wxImage sig(m_sigloc, wxBITMAP_TYPE_JPEG);
00164         if (sig.Ok())
00165         {
00166             sig.Rescale(200,50);
00167             m_sig->SetBitmap(sig);
00168         }
00169         else
00170         {
00171             m_sigloc = "";
00172             wxLogDebug(wxT("Bad image data."));
00173         }
00174     }
00175     
00176     void OnPic(wxCommandEvent& event)
00177     {
00178         m_picloc = wxFileSelector(wxT("Select a picture file"), "", "",
00179             ".jpg", "*.jpg", wxFILE_MUST_EXIST, this);
00180         
00181         wxImage pic(m_picloc, wxBITMAP_TYPE_JPEG);
00182         if (pic.Ok())
00183         {
00184             pic.Rescale(128,128);
00185             m_pic->SetBitmap(pic);
00186         }
00187         else
00188         {
00189             m_picloc = "";
00190             wxLogDebug(wxT("Bad image data."));
00191         }
00192     }
00193 
00194     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00195     {
00196         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetSignature(m_sigloc.c_str());
00197         m_parent->GetCustomer().SetPicture(m_picloc.c_str());
00198         return true;
00199     }
00200     
00201     wxSize GetMin() { return m_min; }
00202 
00203  private:
00204     wxSize m_min;
00205     YardNewCustomer * m_parent;
00206     wxStaticBitmap * m_pic;
00207     wxStaticBitmap * m_sig;
00208     wxString m_sigloc;
00209     wxString m_picloc;
00210     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00211       
00212 };
00213 
00214 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(YardNewCustomer4, wxWizardPageSimple)
00215     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_CUST_PIC_SELECT"), YardNewCustomer4::OnPic)
00216     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_CUST_SELECT_SIG"), YardNewCustomer4::OnSig)
00217 END_EVENT_TABLE()
